text: Percy Griffith Davies, QC (October 29, 1902 – January 26, 1992) was a barrister and a Canadian federal politician. Davies ran in a by-election after the death of incumbent John Francis Buckley on March 21, 1932. He won the hotly contested election and came out on top of a field of 4 candidates. Davies served out his term and did not run again in 1935. ==External links== * Category:1902 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Alberta Category:Conservative Party of Canada (1867–1942) MPs
title: Percy Griffith Davies
